Articles.Content:
What the thread title implies.

I've finally taken a crack at this, and mostly screwing around in image creators/editors/post-processors to create these pieces of blobs.

Anyway, my debut:
Nice work. I'd like to see more of this.
It looks okay. I it looks a little too filter raped and the spacecraft not being effected at all is a little jarring.
I like it a lot, Kerbol looks imposing!

It looks okay. I it looks a little too filter raped and the spacecraft not being effected at all is a little jarring.

That was actually Kerbol's fault. There was too much light, and the shadowy bits got left out. I do agree that this looks a bit off, but I am still experimenting with different effects for different photos. Anyway new one coming soon, and hopefully I can actually do this with more quality.
